# List of awards and nominations received by Mahira Khan

Mahira Khan is a Pakistani actress who appears primarily in Urdu films along with television. Khan is the recipient of 21 accolades into her credit. She has received several Best Actress at the Lux Style Awards including a nomination at the Nigar Awards for film Ho Mann Jahaan. She has received Best Television Actress at the Hum Awards for her highly acclaimed television series Humsafar and Sadqay Tumhare for the same.
